Services

  • Bagged debris removal – No container needed, up to 30 bags – convenient, fast, and cheaper than container service!
  • Junk removal – Old furniture, broken appliances, or piles of junk? We haul it away – loading help available if needed.
  • Bag supply – We can provide strong 70L bags upon request (+100 HUF/bag).
  • No loading assistance – You load it – we haul it.
  • Within 30 km radius – Göd and surrounding areas, including Dunakeszi, Vác, Fót, Veresegyház.
  • Construction debris transport – Concrete, brick, tile, plaster, etc. transported in bags – 1 to 3 m³.
  • Site transports – Transport of wood, metal, pallets and light materials up to 2 m³.
  • Frequent transport needs – Monthly flat-rate or fleet discount contracts available.
  • Invoice provided – Official invoice provided for every transport.
  • Urgent dispatch – Urgent dispatch available within 24 hours.

♻️ What we don't transport

  • Hazardous waste (paint, oil, batteries)
  • Electronic waste (e.g. TVs, fridges)
  • Liquid or biological waste

Our Offer: Cheaper, faster, more flexible than a container! Call us today!

About Us

We’re locals, not corporations. Gödi Sittes is an independent, local business. No containers, no hidden fees, no fake offers. What we agree on is what you get.

Clean transport, clear communication. We operate with a flatbed truck that fits anywhere. Whether it's a house or construction site, you can count on us to arrive on time and settle fairly.

No nonsense. We won’t email you three times, we won’t string you along for weeks. You call → we come → problem solved. That’s it.

Why choose us?

  1. We’re not outrageously expensive.
  2. No need for a container, permit, or waiting.
  3. You can reach us by phone, not just via forms.
  4. If needed, we’ll be there tomorrow.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is 'clean rubble'?

Construction/demolition waste without household trash, hazardous material, wood or plastic. E.g. brick, concrete, tile, plaster.

How much do you remove at once?

Typically up to 1–2 m³, around 30–60 bags. For larger amounts, contact us first.

Do I need to buy bags in advance?

If you have your own bags, great! If not, we can provide strong 70L bags for 100 HUF each.

Where do you offer pickup?

Mainly Göd, Dunakeszi, Fót, Vác, Veresegyház and nearby areas. We serve towns within 30 km.

What happens to the collected waste?

Clean rubble is delivered to an official inert waste facility, in an environmentally friendly and documented manner.

Privacy Policy

The operator of GodiSittes.hu is committed to protecting your personal data. We only use your information to provide the service (e.g. contact, quote). We do not share your data with third parties.
Data controller: Zoltán Horváth – info@godisittes.hu
You may request data deletion via email at any time.

Terms and Conditions

By placing an order, the Customer accepts that:
– the transport date is agreed in advance;
– payment is due on-site or via bank transfer;
– the service provider may refuse service for hazardous waste;
– complaints may be submitted via email: info@godisittes.hu.

Legal Disclaimer

The character 'Zsákos Dzsoni' is fictional. The name 'Gödi Sittes' is a wordplay used for marketing purposes. The company's founders and employees do NOT have criminal records, have NOT been in prison, and are NOT associated with any criminal organizations. The wording of the site uses humor and satire and is not reflective of real individuals' character or history. Please interpret accordingly.
